snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg is a chopper fanatic who has his own and pilots it, too, with a reputation for fastidiousness behind the controls.
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg is near the top of an ultraexclusive waiting list for a hybrid helicopter-plane, which will not be ready until 2016 and may cost between $5 million and $30 million; Bloomberg is known to be a chopper fanatic who has his own and pilots it, too.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg is a chopper fanatic who has his own and pilots it, too, with a reputation for fastidiousness behind the controls.

headline.seo: In Mayor Bloomberg’s Jet-Setting Heart, a Love for Helicopters
headline.main: In His Helicopter, Bloomberg Can Rule Skies, and Even Get to Albany
headline.print_headline: In His Copter, Bloomberg Can Rule Skies, and Even Get to Albany
